heisigStory: We have here a rather small mouth (it is always compressed when set on the left) next to a much larger piece of dirt. It is not hard to imagine what you might do if you got a mouth full of dirt. As least I know what I would do: spit it out as fast and far as I could!
koohiiStory1: The only things that come out of my MOUTH and onto the GROUND are spit and vomit. Everything else (words, song) floats on the air.
koohiiStory2: SPIT goes from my MOUTH to the GROUND.
myStory: nhổ. nhổ từ miệng xuống đất
words: to breathe, to tell (lies), to vomit, to disgorge
